# writeOrder(_:)

**Instance Method**

Writes the display order of the media sources to the accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
func writeOrder(_ order: [Int]) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **order**: The new display order for the media sources. Provides an ordered list of [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMCharacteristicTypeIdentifier] values for [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMServiceTypeInputSource] services associated with the profile.

## Discussion

An error is thrown if the source ordering fails to be written to the accessory.

## Managing input source order

- **delegate**: The property that handles updates to the display order.
- **order**: The display order of input media sources.
- **canModifyOrder**: A Boolean that indicates if the display order of the input media sources can be modified.
- **HMMediaSourceDisplayOrderProfile.Delegate**: The protocol through which a delegate receives updates on the order of input media sources.
